item.title: Mithran add a quote by Jennifer Egan
item.description: "I don’t want to fade away, I want to flame away - I want my death to be an attraction, a spectacle, a mystery. A work of art." -- Jennifer Egan

item.title: Mithran add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "To absent friends, lost loves, old gods, and the season of mists; and may each and every one of us always give the devil his due." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Mithran add a quote by Fernando Pessoa
item.description:
"I Know, I Alone
I know, I alone How much it hurts, this heart With no faith nor law Nor melody nor thought.
Only I, only I And none of this can I say Because feeling is like the sky - Seen, nothing in it to see." -- Fernando Pessoa

item.title: Mithran add a quote by Stan Slap
item.description: "The worst thing in your own development as a leader is not to do it wrong. It’s to do it for the wrong reasons." -- Stan Slap

item.title: Mithran add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Everybody is a genius. But if you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will live its whole life believing that it is stupid." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Mithran add a quote by Derek Landy
item.description: "Embrace your inner lunatic. Fun times guaranteed." -- Derek Landy

item.title: Mithran add a quote by Gloria Steinem
item.description: "A woman without a man is like a fish without a bicycle." -- Gloria Steinem

item.title: Mithran add a quote by Fernando Pessoa
item.description: "No intelligent idea can gain general acceptance unless some stupidity is mixed in with it" -- Fernando Pessoa

item.title: Mithran add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "If you want to make God laugh, tell him about your plans." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Mithran add a quote by Nikolai Gogol, in The Government Inspector presented by the EGBA and performed by the ORAD
item.description: "I am who I am and that's who I am" -- Nikolai Gogol, in The Government Inspector presented by the EGBA and performed by the ORAD

item.title: Mithran add a quote by Charles M. Schultz
item.description: "Happiness is waking up, looking at the clock and finding that you still have two hours left to sleep." -- Charles M. Schultz

item.title: Mithran add a quote by Jeff Lindsay
item.description: "You're driving me NORMAL!" -- Jeff Lindsay

item.title: Mithran add a quote by Logan Pearsall Smith
item.description: "People say that life is the thing, but I prefer reading." -- Logan Pearsall Smith

item.title: Mithran add a quote by Charlie Chaplin
item.description: "I always like walking in the rain, so no one can see me crying." -- Charlie Chaplin

item.title: Mithran add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "So, please, oh please, we beg, we pray, go throw your TV set away, and in its place you can install, a lovely bookcase on the wall." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Mithran add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "Those who don't believe in magic will never find it." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Mithran add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "So, I love you because the entire universe conspired to help me find you." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Mithran add a quote by Lady Gaga
item.description: "Some women choose to follow men, and some women choose to follow their dreams. If you're wondering which way to go, remember that your career will never wake up and tell you that it doesn't love you anymore." -- Lady Gaga

item.title: Mithran add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The heart was made to be broken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Mithran add a quote by Zelda Fitzgerald
item.description: "Nobody has ever measured, not even poets, how much the heart can hold." -- Zelda Fitzgerald

item.title: Mithran add a quote by James A. Baldwin
item.description: "Love does not begin and end the way we seem to think it does. Love is a battle, love is a war; love is a growing up." -- James A. Baldwin

item.title: Mithran add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "I love you more than there are stars in the sky and fish in the sea." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Mithran add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "My daddy said, that the first time you fall in love, it changes you forever and no matter how hard you try, that feeling just never goes away." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Mithran add a quote by Max Lucado
item.description: "A woman's heart should be so hidden in God that a man has to seek Him just to find her." -- Max Lucado

item.title: Mithran add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "Love is an irresistible desire to be irresistibly desired." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Mithran add a quote by Bertrand Russell
item.description: "Of all forms of caution, caution in love is perhaps the most fatal to true happiness." -- Bertrand Russell

item.title: Mithran add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The very essence of romance is uncertainty." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Mithran add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "You can't measure the mutual affection of two human beings by the number of words they exchange." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Mithran add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "If you gave someone your heart and they died, did they take it with them? Did you spend the rest of forever with a hole inside you that couldn't be filled?" -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Mithran add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "True love is rare, and it's the only thing that gives life real meaning." -- Nicholas Sparks
